name: Ice Cream Truck Simulator (Summer Game Jam 2021)
name_original: Ice Cream Truck Simulator (Summer Game Jam 2021)
description:
Ice Cream Truck Simulator (Summer Game Jam 2021) is a shooter game developed by Drewby Greydark. It came out on 15-08-2021.
Ice Cream Truck Simulator (Summer Game Jam 2021) is available on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
